Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: KCIS Newsmakers, featuring Keith Black, is a news program looking at the top stories and other issues of concern to the church locally, nationally and internationally. KCIS 630 Radio broadcasts from Seattle, Washington and is available to stream from kcisradio.com, via the KCIS Radio mobile app, and
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
